sentences.english: In addition, Chen et al gun advocates say that the press should be simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還有陳榮袞等人提倡報章宜改用淺說。

sentences.english: Listed companies are not generally required to issue paid announcements in gazetted newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司毋須在憲報指定報章刊登付款公佈披露資料。

sentences.english: Newspaper harshly criticized the Judge's dismissal of the appeal.
sentences.chinese: 法官駁回上訴，報章對此加以嚴厲批評。

sentences.english: This is normally only used in newspapers, or when talking about the inhabitants of Britain in earlier time.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞通常只見於報章，也指英倫三島的早期居民。

sentences.english: The libraries subscribed to more than 8622 titles of local and overseas newspapers and periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館併購備了逾8622份本港及海外報章和期刊。

sentences.english: I often read English books and magazines.
sentences.chinese: 而且我經常閱讀英文報章雜誌。

sentences.english: The headlined unemployment rate is just over 10 percent.
sentences.chinese: 報章頭條的失業率已高過10個百分點。

sentences.english: The newspaper which Mr. Chan enjoys reading is wenweipao.
sentences.chinese: 陳先生愛看的那份報章是《文匯報》。

sentences.english: GEM Companies are usually not required to issue paid announcements in gazetted newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司一般毋須在憲報指定報章刊登付款公佈。

sentences.english: Copies of all Chinese and English announcements of the Company published in Hong Kong newspapers during the period of the annual report.
sentences.chinese: 報告期內在香港報章上刊登的所有中英文公告副本。

sentences.english: WenYi puzzled, and inform the bright newspaper reported.
sentences.chinese: 溫易不知就裏，便將報章的報道告知明亮。

sentences.english: Content of the Lianhe Zaobao differs from that of the English dailies.
sentences.chinese: 《聯合早報》的內容跟英文報章不同。

sentences.english: I know about portable entertainment products through printed ads.
sentences.chinese: 我從報章雜誌廣告中認識這些產品。

sentences.english: Tens of newspapers and magazines has published his works and made subject introduction on him.
sentences.chinese: 數十家報章雜誌發表作品及專題介紹。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong newspapers have also made analyses of the need for anti-manipulation actions.
sentences.chinese: 這次香港報章亦有分析反操控行動的必要性。

sentences.english: Chi feng every day just to drugs, but the information obtained from newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 志峯每天只想着毒品，但所得的資料都是來自報章。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
